settings.product_heading: Say bye, bye to spills and dust
settings.product_body:
A crinkle-free, breathable, and waterproof protector to keep your mattress free from dust, stains, and spills. Compatible with all Emma mattresses and more.

Our mattress protector is made with revolutionary allergy shield technology and is clinically proven to protect from dust mites and pet hair allergens. Unwanted spills and moisture is kept out with our 100% waterproof protective layer.

settings.scale_title: What does an Emma mattress feel like?
settings.scale_description: Emma mattresses are in the medium-firm range, which means you’ll be sleeping in cloudy comfort with just the right amount of support!

settings.question: Materials and Care
settings.answer: Our mattress protectors are made to stand the test of time and undergo strict testing to assure they meet the highest quality standards. Made with 100% polyester with applied Purotex® technology. When it needs a clean, simply pop it into your washing machine at a cool 104°F.

settings.question: Delivery Policy
settings.answer:
Free Delivery

We work with UPS and FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

settings.question: Return Policy
settings.answer:
Easy Return

Enjoy a 100-nights free trial on your Emma Mattress Protector. We typically require an adjustment period of at least 3 weeks as our researchers confirm that it takes around that long to get suited to your Emma product. Of course, we've made returning any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest. Our returns are of course completely free.

settings.question: 10 year guarantee
settings.answer: Each Emma mattress also comes with a 10-year guarantee- that’s how sure of the quality we are.

settings.banner_heading: Build your bedroom with these steals from Emma.
